name: Kale with Kiwi
author: Always Cooking Up Something
summary: Zing up some healthy kale with kiwi, ginger, garlic and lots of black pepper for a great veggie side dish.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 bunch lacinato (dinosaur) kale, washed and sliced thin
directions: Heat coconut oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add garlic, ginger, sea salt and freshly ground black pepper; cook and stir until garlic begins to turn color, about 3 minutes
Stir in chopped kiwi and oregano leaves and cook for another 2 minutes
Add kale; lower heat to medium and cook until kale is dark green and tender, about 5 minutes
Stir in slivered almonds and adjust seasonings to taste
